description: Got up to level 5 on this, think that's where the limit is for me so far. It is a great quick game with 2 players. Looks good, plays easy.. nice!
Solo

Very fun, light game. Love the amount of dice in this game and the size and look of them.  The turn order in the game I like a lot (clockwise then counter clock wise until all play twice). The special paid moves are not used as much when I play and the rules for them are a bit obtuse.

description: Like Azul, but with dice. Interesting premise, purchased on the recommendation of the Game Boy Geek, but ultimately wound up disappointed. Fun, but not amazing.

title: I like Azu...
description: I like Azul better for the looks and gameplay, but I really enjoy Sagrada. Really fast play, good visuals and fun! Specially if you have children, this one is perfect for a family night!

title: Dice draft...
description: Dice drafting, 1-4 players, 30 minutes, medium light. Rating based on a dozen games with 1, 2, 3 and 4 players.Please check my review at:https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1794533/sagrada-dutch-revie...

title: Don't norm...
description: Don't normally like dice games. The randomness just makes the whole exercise feel ... pointless. And yet Sagrada has me coming back for more. How? Drafting dice, mitigating glass beads of action, and board difficulty variability. Good on you Sagrada.

title: Rated an 8...
description: Rated an 8 because family likes it a lot.  In the abstract, more of a 7 for me.

description: This game is waaaay prettier in photos than in real life. It's actually kind of chintzy looking in person. It's a totally reasonable little puzzle - nothing mind-blowing.

title: Victorias
description: Victorias

Sagrada is a casual puzzle game where everyone essentially plays solo and has their potential plans ruined by the others involved in the game. Players take turns drafting form a dice pool to fill their windows which require placing die that match color or value or both with specific restrictions. There's no tension between players, and it's a beautiful game that's light on commitment and time.

title:
12.1.17 

...
description:
12.1.17 

Fun, little abstract that includes dice drafting, puzzly player boards, public & secret goals, and rule breaking cards. Having the boards front and center so you can see what your opponents are trying to do is a must for more player interaction. This means the game is best at 2 and good at 3.
